changeSet.author: wilsoncampusano
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE solicitud_areacomun ( id int UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, area_comun_id int not null, inquilino_id int not null, fecha_solicitud date, CONSTRAINT cons_inquilino FOREIGN KEY fk_inquilino (inquilino_id) REFERENCES inquilino(id) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
